Dictionary.description: Soil classification codes as defined by ASTM-D2487. These codes are used as values for the classificationCode property of the Lithology object.
Dictionary.name: DIGGS Soil Classification Codelist Definitions (ASTM D2487)

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of soil passes No. 200 sieve; inorganic; LL = 50; and PI plots above "A" line.
diggs:Definition.name: Fat clay

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of soil passes No. 200 sieve; inorganic; LL < 50; PI> 7; and plots on or above "A" line.
diggs:Definition.name: Lean clay

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of soil passes No. 200 sieve; liquid limit < 50; inorganic; plots in the hatched (CL-ML) zone in the plasticity chart.
diggs:Definition.name: Silty clay

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve; passing No.200 > 12%; Atterberg's limits plot above "A" line and plasticity index greater than 7.
diggs:Definition.name: Clayey gravel

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve; passing No.200 > 12%; Atterberg's limits fall in hatched area marked CL-ML.
diggs:Definition.name: Silty, clayey gravel

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve; passing No.200 > 12%; Atterberg's limits plot below "A" line and plasticity index <4.
diggs:Definition.name: Silty gravel

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve; passing No.200 > 5%; and not meeting Cu and Cc criteria for GW.
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded gravel

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve; passing No.200 is 5-12%; and meets the criteria for GP and GC.
diggs:Definition.identifier: Poorly graded gravel with clay (or silty clay)
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded gravel with clay (or silty clay)

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve; passing No.200 is 5-12%; and meets the criteria for GP and GM.
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded gravel with silt

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve. passisng No. 200 screen <5%; Cu = 4 and 1 = Cc = 3
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded gravel

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve; passing No.200 is 5-12%; and meets the criteria for GW and GC.
diggs:Definition.identifier: Well-graded gravel with clay (or silty clay)
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded gravel with clay (or silty clay)

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil on No.4 sieve; passing No.200 is 5-12%; and meets the criteria for GW and GM.
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded gravel with silt

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of soil passes No. 200 sieve; inorganic; LL = 50; and PI plots below "A" line.
diggs:Definition.name: Elastic silt

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of soil passes No. 200 sieve; inorganic; LL < 50; PI < 4, or plots below "A" line.
diggs:Definition.name: Silt

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of soil passes No. 200 sieve; organic; (LL for oven dried sample)/(LL for non dried sample) < 0.75; and LL = 50.
diggs:Definition.name: Organic clay

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of soil passes No. 200 sieve; organic; (LL for oven dried sample)/(LL for non dried sample) < 0.75; and LL < 50.
diggs:Definition.name: Organic clay

diggs:Definition.description: Peat, muck, and other highly organic soils.
diggs:Definition.name: Peat

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 > 12%; Atterberg's limits plot above "A" line in the plasticity chart or plasticity index greater than 7.
diggs:Definition.name: Clayey sand

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 > 12%; Atterberg's limits fall in hatched area marked CL-ML on the plasticity chart.
diggs:Definition.name: Silty, clayey sand

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 > 12%; Atterberg's limits plot below "A" line in the plasticity chart or plasticity index less than 4.
diggs:Definition.name: Silty sand

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 < 5%; and not meeting both criteria for SW.
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded sand

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 is 5-12%; and meet she criteria for SP and SC.
diggs:Definition.identifier: Poorly graded sand with clay (or silty clay)
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded sand with clay (or silty clay)

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 is 5-12%; and meet she criteria for SP and SM.
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded sand with silt

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 < 5%; Cu = 6 and 1 = Cc = 3.
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded sand

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 is 5-12%; and meet she criteria for SW and SC.
diggs:Definition.identifier: Well-graded sand with clay (or silty clay)
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded sand with clay (or silty clay)

diggs:Definition.description: More than half of coarse soil passes No.4 sieve; passing No.200 is 5-12%; and meet she criteria for SW and SM.
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded sand with silt

diggs:Definition.description: CH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Fat clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: CH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Fat clay with sand

diggs:Definition.description: CH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy fat clay

diggs:Definition.description: CH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy fat clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: CH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly fat clay

diggs:Definition.description: CH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly fat clay with sand

diggs:Definition.description: CL with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Lean clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: CL with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Lean clay with sand

diggs:Definition.description: CL with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy lean clay

diggs:Definition.description: CL with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy lean clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: CL with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly lean clay

diggs:Definition.description: CL with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly lean clay with sand

diggs:Definition.description: CL-ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Silty clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: CL-ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Silty clay with sand

diggs:Definition.description: CL-ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy silty clay

diggs:Definition.description: CL-ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy silty clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: CL-ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly silty clay

diggs:Definition.description: CL-ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly silty clay with sand

diggs:Definition.description: ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Silt with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Silt with sand

diggs:Definition.description: ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy silt

diggs:Definition.description: ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy silt with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly silt

diggs:Definition.description: ML with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly silt with sand

diggs:Definition.description: MH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Elastic silt with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: MH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Elastic silt with sand

diggs:Definition.description: MH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy elastic silt

diggs:Definition.description: MH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy elastic silt with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: MH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly elastic silt

diggs:Definition.description: MH with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly elastic silt with sand

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI = 4 and plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Organic clay with gravel (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI = 4 and plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Organic clay with sand (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI = 4 and plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy organic clay (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI = 4 and plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy organic clay with gravel (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI = 4 and plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly organic clay (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI = 4 and plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly organic clay with sand (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Organic clay with gravel (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Organic clay with sand (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy organic clay (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy organic clay with gravel (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly organic clay (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots on or above "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly organic clay with sand (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI < 4 or plots below "A" line; coarser than No. 200 screen < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Organic silt (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI < 4 or plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Organic silt with gravel (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI < 4 or plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Organic silt with sand (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI < 4 or plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy organic silt (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI < 4 or plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy organic silt with gravel (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI < 4 or plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly organic silt (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OL where PI < 4 or plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly organic silt with sand (OL)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots below "A" line; coarser than No. 200 screen < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Organic silt (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Organic silt with gravel (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 15% and < 30% and % sand = % gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Organic silt with sand (OH)

diggs:Definition.name: Sandy organic silt (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand = % gravel and % gravel = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Sandy organic silt with gravel (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand < 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly organic silt (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: OH that plots below "A" line; with coarser than No. 200 screen = 30% and % sand < % gravel and % sand = 15%
diggs:Definition.name: Gravelly organic silt with sand (OH)

diggs:Definition.description: GW with = 15% sand
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded gravel with sand

diggs:Definition.description: GP with = 15% sand
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded gravel with sand

diggs:Definition.description: GW-GM with = 15% sand
diggs:Definition.identifier: Well-graded gravel with silt and sand
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded gravel with silt and sand

diggs:Definition.description: GW-GC with = 15% sand
diggs:Definition.identifier: Well-graded gravel with clay and sand (or silty clay and sand)
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded gravel with clay and sand (or silty clay and sand)

diggs:Definition.description: GP-GM with = 15% sand
diggs:Definition.identifier: Poorly graded gravel with silt and sand
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded gravel with silt and sand

diggs:Definition.description: GP-GC with = 15% sand
diggs:Definition.identifier: Poorly graded gravel with clay and sand (or silty clay and sand)
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded gravel with clay and sand (or silty clay and sand)

diggs:Definition.name: Silty gravel with sand

diggs:Definition.name: Clayey gravel with sand

diggs:Definition.description: GC-GM with = 15% sand
diggs:Definition.name: Silty, clayey gravel with sand

diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded sand with gravel

diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded sand with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: SW-SM with = 15% gravel
diggs:Definition.identifier: Well-graded sand with silt and gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded sand with silt and gravel

diggs:Definition.description: SW-SC with = 15% gravel
diggs:Definition.identifier: Well-graded sand with clay and gravel (or silty clay and gravel)
diggs:Definition.name: Well-graded sand with clay and gravel (or silty clay and gravel)

diggs:Definition.identifier: Poorly graded sand with silt and gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded sand with silt and gravel

diggs:Definition.description: SP-SC with = 15% gravel
diggs:Definition.identifier: Poorly graded sand with clay and gravel (or silty clay and gravel)
diggs:Definition.name: Poorly graded sand with clay and gravel (or silty clay and gravel)

diggs:Definition.name: Silty sand with gravel

diggs:Definition.name: Clayey sand with gravel

diggs:Definition.description: SC-SM with = 15% gravel
diggs:Definition.name: Silty, clayey sand with gravel
